text:
[TABLE from 1. Annual Report 2023-24.pdf, Page 81]
                                                                                        0
                                                                        5.  Job Fair 2024
           The Job Fair/Open House 2024, hosted by the Career Services Office was held at
              FAST-NUCES Islamabad Campus on April 25th, 2024. The event was a resounding
     success, attracting a total of 620 graduating students who showcased their projects.
It  provided  a  platform  for  students  to  interact  with  189  registered  companies,
     including 8 consultants, facilitating networking, job opportunities, and exposure to
industry  trends.  The  seamless  execution  of  the  event  was  made  possible  by  the
  dedication  of  more  than  400  ushers,  whose  contributions  ensured  a  smooth  and
                                                  efficient experience for all attendees.
